mapper.select: select fk_userid as userid, email, email_acept, username, nickname, to_char(join_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as join_date, status, point, profile_image from tbl_member M left join tbl_member_login L on fk_userid = userid where userid = #{userid}

select V.userid as userid, V.email as email, V.email_acept as email_acept, V.nickname as nickname, V.point as point, to_char(V.join_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as join_date , V.profile_image as profile_image, V.username as username, V.kakao as kakao, V.naver as naver, V.google as google, V.facebook as facebook , V.authority as authority, C.academy_name as academy_name, C.company_num as company_num, C.homepage as homepage, C.tel as tel, status from ( select A.userid,email,email_acept,nickname,point,join_date,profile_image,username,kakao,google,naver,facebook, authority, status from ( select userid, status from tbl_member_login )A left join tbl_member B on A.userid = B.fk_userid ) V left join tbl_academy_member C on V.userid = C.fk_userid where userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_advertisement (advertisement_num, division, client_name, client_phone, url, start_date, period, status, filename, orgfilename, filesize) values(seq_advertisement.nextval, #{division}, #{client_name}, #{client_phone}, #{url}, sysdate, #{period}, default, #{filename}, #{orgfilename}, #{filesize})
mapper.select: select rnum, report_num, fk_num, report_nickname, reported_nickname, simple_report_reason, detail_report_reason, to_char(report_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as report_date, report_type from ( select rownum as rnum, report_num, fk_num, report_nickname, reported_nickname, simple_report_reason, detail_report_reason, report_date, report_type from ( select report_num, fk_board_num as fk_num, report_nickname, reported_nickname, simple_report_reason, detail_report_reason, report_date, report_type from tbl_board_report union all select report_num, fk_comment_num as fk_num, report_nickname, reported_nickname, simple_report_reason, detail_report_reason, report_date, report_type from tbl_comment_report ) V ) D where report_num = #{report_num}
select fk_userid from ( select nickname, penalty_num from tbl_penalty where penalty_num = #{penalty_num} ) P join ( select nickname, fk_userid from tbl_member ) M on P.nickname = M.nickname
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment_report values(seq_report.nextval, #{fk_comment_num}, #{report_nickname}, #{reported_nickname}, #{simple_report_reason}, #{detail_report_reason}, sysdate, default, default)
